|elevation_ft = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |blank_name = |blank_info = |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} Gelephu is the headquarters and the capital city of Sarpang District, Bhutan. It is one of the fastest growing cities and trading sites of Bhutan. == References == Category:Settlements in Bhutan
